name: ff-download-cleaner
title: Download Cleaner
description: Automatically removes entries from the new download history.
author: Daniel Betz

preferences.name: clearOnDownload
preferences.title: Clear downloads instantly
preferences.description: Remove downloads from history instantly, effectively disabling the download history.

preferences.name: clearDelay
preferences.title: Delay (seconds) before removing download
preferences.description: Downloads will be removed after the set time. Applies only to instant clearing.

preferences.name: clearOnExit
preferences.title: Clear downloads on exit
preferences.description: Delete download history when closing Firefox.

preferences.name: clearNow
preferences.title: Clear downloads now
preferences.label: Clear now
preferences.description: Perform an on-demand clearing of the download history. Please note that this may take a long time during which your browser will be non-responsive.
